scripts.cf-export-marketing: dotenv -e ./.env -- bash -c 'contentful space export --config contentful/export-config.json --content-file marketing-export.json --mt $CTF_CMA_ACCESS_TOKEN --space-id $CTF_MARKETING_SPACE_ID --environment-id $CTF_ENVIRONMENT'
scripts.cf-export-masterdata: dotenv -e ./.env -- bash -c 'contentful space export --config contentful/export-config.json --content-file masterdata-export.json --mt $CTF_CMA_ACCESS_TOKEN --space-id $CTF_MASTER_DATA_SPACE_ID --environment-id $CTF_ENVIRONMENT'
